htmlTemplatesSimple.nextFAQItem:
%(number)d. %(question)s

%(answer)s

battleVictoryResult.message:
_(#messenger:serviceChannelMessages/battleResults/victory)!

Map: %(arenaName)s %(fortBuilding)s
_(#messenger:serviceChannelMessages/battleResults/tanks): %(vehicleNames)s
Exp: %(xp)s%(xpEx)s%(gold)s Credits: %(credits)s%(creditsEx)s%(club)s%(fortResource)s%(achieves)s%(lock)s%(quests)s

battleDrawGameResult.message:
_(#messenger:serviceChannelMessages/battleResults/drawGame)

Map: %(arenaName)s %(fortBuilding)s
_(#messenger:serviceChannelMessages/battleResults/tanks): %(vehicleNames)s
Exp: %(xp)s%(xpEx)s%(gold)s Credits: %(credits)s%(creditsEx)s%(club)s%(fortResource)s%(achieves)s%(lock)s%(quests)s

battleDefeatResult.message:
_(#messenger:serviceChannelMessages/battleResults/defeat)

Map: %(arenaName)s %(fortBuilding)s
_(#messenger:serviceChannelMessages/battleResults/tanks): %(vehicleNames)s
Exp: %(xp)s%(xpEx)s%(gold)s Credits: %(credits)s%(creditsEx)s%(club)s%(fortResource)s%(achieves)s%(lock)s%(quests)s

clanMessageWarning.message: <font color='#8C8C7C' face='$FieldFont' size='14'>%(message)s </font><font color='#C9C9B6' face='$FieldFont' size='14'>%(fullClanName)s</font>

telecomVehicleStatus.message: <font color="#e9e2bf" face="$TitleFont" size="15">%(title)s</font> <font color="#8C8C7C" face="$FieldFont" size="14">%(comment)s</font> <font color="#595950" face="$FieldFont" size="14">%(subcomment)s</font>

telecomVehicleRemoved.message: <font color="#e9e2bf" face="$TitleFont" size="15">_(#system_messages:telecom/notifications/vehicleRemoved/title)</font> <font color="#8C8C7C" face="$FieldFont" size="14">_(#system_messages:telecom/notifications/vehicleRemoved/comment)</font> <font color="#595950" face="$FieldFont" size="14">_(#system_messages:telecom/notifications/vehicleRemoved/subcomment)</font>
